txt.en: Congratulations! You have obtained your first Legendary Item. In order to equip this Item, you must first have it identified by a Forge-master. When you do identify it, the Item's hidden potential will be revealed. If you start using the weapon, it will earn levels and legendary points that you can use to further improve its Legacies.

Congratulations! You have obtained your first Legendary Item. These items can grow with your character by reforging it at a forge-master occasionally as you level up, and by adding traceries to it that you find in your adventures. Once a tracery has been added to your weapon, it may be further improved by using Runes of Enhancement to increase their level.
